about_the_game:
NOTICE: This game is currently in development! Our first Early Access version should be coming out by the end of this month! Please look forward to it!



Solanaceae: After All is a casual visual novel and gathering/crafting game hybrid with a major focus on story, character interactions, and watching sexy scenes! It will hopefully be an easy to pick up game, where you enjoy the story at your own pace, brew interesting potions and cook cute things, and hunt down and watch some very sexy scenes if you choose to do so. This game is queer, trans, and very, very indulgent.

Join Battam, a witch exiled by all conventional covens, on his quest to make a brand new type of coven with the help of his partner Sal, and his sibling, Satine. Explore a colorful world filled with all types of people and try to create a place where any and all rejected witches can join together to create new kinds of magic, and form bonds that will last a lifetime. Grow ever closer to Battam's loving and long term partner, Sal, learn more about Battam's sibling Satine and watch them repair their shaky relationship, meet new people that challenge Battam's beliefs, and discover new ways that magic interacts with with the world-- all while fighting back against the overbearing Rowan Coven who is trying to stop any and all of Battam's progress!





This game contains R-18 scenes, with the option to opt out entirely in the beginning of the game for a strictly PG-13 version, if that is what you prefer.

Current features are...
-Gather items to brew cool potions and cook yummy food!
-Sell potions to make cash!
-Give gifts and get to know your coven members!
-A completely original soundtrack!
-2 sexy scenes with comic style art and a LOT of expressions!

Planned features are...
-~100k+ main story focusing on character development and interaction!
-An upgraded gathering/crafting system!
-Upgrade your coven for bonuses!
-A quest log to help you track what you're doing!
-Lots of good 'ol achievements!
-10 sexy scenes in total with so, so much art...
-Choose which sex scenes you want to see, if any at all. This will include content warnings for each scene.
-Way more lore about the world than the comics have!

About the Creator
Hi! I'm DCS! I'm a queer comic artist and game dev who is incredibly passionate about these characters and world. I've been working with them for many years now, and I feel like this game is going to be such a good way to enjoy them if you like them already-- or are totally new to them. Don't feel shy in looking up Solanaceae, as you will find many comics and other games to enjoy while you wait for this game to be completed!



Based on my comic of the same name...
That's right! "Solanaceae" was a comic before it was a game! The comic is not required reading for the game to be enjoyable, but it does help a lot. The comic takes place before the game and is currently ongoing. Once the comic wraps up, it'll be available as a PDF through this page or somehow integrated into the game.

About the Music
The full original soundtrack can be found on most music streaming platforms, just look up "Solanaceae: After All" and you should be able to find it!

About the Team
--DCS (Writing, character art, background art, programing, concepts)
--Grue (Programing)
--Ladi (Coding Assistant)
--CanaryWitch (Logo, art)
--Genga (Music)

More information will be added later. We're looking forward to working with you to make a fun and fruitful game for everyone! Thanks!

The side sex scenes are between a trans fem character and males, females, non-binaries, etc. Many scenes contain depictions of consensual BDSM play, which include things like being tied up, being talked down to, etc. There are also voyeuristic and exhibitionist elements, as well as sex outdoors or in public spaces.
